tool.name: Imports image or model

param.name: input_type_selector
param.label: Select type of data being downloaded

tool.help:
**Description**
Downloads an image or model from the URL provided, if they are considered valid inputs.
-----
**Input**
A link to an image or model. An image must be a valid OME.TIFF_, and any model must be a valid MAT-file_.
OME.TIFF's provided are validated using the BioFormats_ command line tools_.
-----
**Output**
The file is placed in the workspace of the current history if it is deemed valid.
.. _OME.TIFF: https://docs.openmicroscopy.org/ome-model/5.6.3/ome-tiff/index.html .. _MAT-file: https://www.mathworks.com/help/matlab/import_export/mat-file-versions.html .. _BioFormats: http://www.openmicroscopy.org/site/products/bio-formats .. _tools: http://www.openmicroscopy.org/site/support/bio-formats5.5/users/comlinetools
